Sentiments.Phrase: There was a lot of blood on my hands,
but from a workplace accident. I work at the knife shop, you see.
but I tell you he saved my life. He wrapped up the wounds and stopped the bleeding.

Hints: I can't let the jury know it was an accident.
He dreamt that he STABBED him?
I need to make it seem like they still hate each other.
What would be his motive for the murder?
FailureMessages: No, no! I need to try again.
This won't hold up in court!
I need to try again. It's not quite right.
I don't think the jury will buy this...
EmptyFailureMessage: I have to record something. The jury will want to see some evidence...
